newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egypt pound overnight rates slip fractionally.
newsitem.headline: Egypt pound overnight rates slip fractionally.

text.p: Overnight interbank rates on the Egyptian pound fell on Monday to between 8-1/2 and nine percent from 8-7/8 and 9-1/8 percent on Sunday, bankers said.
"The market is slightly more liquid than yesterday," one banker said. The market is traditionally short at the beginning of the working week.
One-week rates also slipped marginally to between 8-1/2 and nine percent, compared to 8-7/8 and 9-1/4 percent on Sunday, bankers said.
